name: True Bard: Duality Labyrinth
description:
This game needs optimization Web version of it still has audio issues, for more comfortable gameplay better download PC version. 

This is game I made in Godot to understand if it's possible to make sound interaction gameplay using only its native audio system. 
It use procedural music generation and few graphic elements reacts to premade melodies.

Assets used in projects by
WENREXA - https://wenrexa.itch.io/
HeartBeast - https://courses.heartgamedev.com/
GDeavid - https://gdeavid.itch.io/
Synty Store - https://syntystore.com/
Tatak Audio
Articulated Sounds - https://articulatedsounds.com/
SoundBits -  https://soundbits.de/
BitGem - https://shop.bitgem3d.com/
